points.value: ->Hands-on experience in Spring-Web, Spring-JPA, Rest-Api's, WebSockets, Gradle, NPM.
-> Involved in re-architecture of the existing product.
-> Integrating and implementing third-party libraries such as VlcJ, Lombok, JEasy.
-> Wrote Junit efficiently can cover up to 96% of the lines.
-> Doing peer-level code review to reduce the code redundancy and improve performance.

-> Having a deep understanding and the importance of code quality,
continuously using the SonarQube to reduce cognitive complexity and code smell.
-> Solved many challenging problems and added intuitive and smart features.
-> Proficiently implemented Design patterns, data structures, and algorithms.
-> Developed many features using only core java and service locator design pattern.
-> Involved in design and development for validating/save master data.
-> Involved in writing tests to log metrics for performance improvements.
-> Worte and delivered code on time with 92% of efficiency.
-> Worked in China(Shenzhen) for 2 months and provided deployment support.

-> Involved in the design and implementation using Java,
J2EE 1.4[Servlets, JSP, EJB, DAO, Action] JavaScript1.2, HTML, CSS.
-> Implement the change requests, along with the application development.

-> Individually worked on Operations Module. Itâ€™s used for ASM, TSO,
Distributor, Retailer, Transaction, and Registration.

It Contains reports on every master programs.
